    link3


    Transitions

    Transitions allow elements to change
    properties over a duration when a
    state change occurs.

    Animations

    Animations allow more control over
    CSS changes using keyframes.

    Key Differences

    Transitions require a trigger,while animations run automatically with keyframes for more complex effects.

    Linear
